root.specsKey: U wont get any camera better than this, at this range...And the quality of the camera is nice...No issues with the camera...And Flipkart is doing an Excellent job out there, they are making me addicted to shop online everytime...Flipkart also provides required accesories with it... Dat i feel very better...

though camera is very basic widout many options, great camera for its price, image clarity pretty good. service of flipkart was really good. keep d good work going guys. all in all a very pleasant shopping experience
this is such wonderful to work with itnice colour range, and good warrany period offer

Hey guys , i got a nikon coolpix about a year ago . Well its a decent camera thats what it is nothing more. You will get shaky, blurred images trust me no matter how steady you keep your hands. So nothing really special about it. There are lots of better cameras of sony or better casio or cannon ...If you buying it because of Nikon brand name , you will regret it , trust these low end are not upto mark . So thats about it . Thanx for reading and bye .:)
this is a very gud digicam for d lowbudget ppl...n gud for startin a fotography...
